messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the requirement for a spell to take effect?
The caster must win an opposed POW roll with the target.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the target if the caster wins the opposed POW roll?
The target begins to drown, falls to the floor, and takes 1D8 damage each round.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What must the target do to stop the effects of the spell?
The target should make an Extreme CON roll (equal to or below one-fifth CON) after taking damage each round.

What must the traveler do after the space-mead has been enchanted?
Find a means of transportation—usually a mount—and drink a dose of space-mead
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a means of transportation the traveler must find in space?
a mount
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the traveler while in space?
they are in mental and physical stasis
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the name of the spell that provides an interstellar steed?
Summon Byakhee
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the process of the traveler drinking a dose?
The traveler drinks a dose, presumably bringing a return dose along, and then climbs on to command the mount, starting the journey.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the travelers while in space?
The travelers are in mental and physical stasis, nearly insensible to their surroundings, during their journey.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are the costs for the Call Deity spell?
The costs for the Call Deity spell are 1+ magic points per person and 1D10 Sanity points, cast only.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who should cast the Call Deity spell?
Only cult priests or desperate people should choose to cast the Call Deity spell, as it is perilous even for cultists.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of people should not call a Mythos deity?
Only cult priests or desperate people
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does the caster of a Call spell act in a group?
As the focus for the group
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when a group sacrifices all magic points in a Call spell?
The spell will always fail
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How long can a group chant for in a Call spell?
Never for more than 100 minutes
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines the percentage chance that a spell works?
The total of the magic points spent.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if the caster rolls a 100 on a spell attempt?
The spell will always fail with all magic points sacrificed in the spell lost.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many Sanity points does the caster lose when casting the spell?
1D10 Sanity points.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is usually the motivation for a Mythos deity when it arrives on Earth?
It wants to stay and is usually hungry.
